verses.verse: Oh clap<WH8628> your hands,<WH3709> all you nations.<WH5971> Shout<WH7321> to God<WH430> with the voice<WH6963> of triumph!<WH7440>
For Yahweh<WH3068> Most High<WH5945> is awesome.<WH3372> He is a great<WH1419> King<WH4428> over all the earth.<WH776>
He subdues<WH1696> nations<WH5971> under us,<WH5971> and peoples under our feet.<WH7272>
He chooses<WH977> our inheritance<WH5159> for us,<WH1347> the glory of Jacob<WH3290> whom he loved.<WH157> Selah.<WH5542>
God<WH430> has gone up<WH5927> with a shout,<WH8643> Yahweh<WH3068> with the sound<WH6963> of a trumpet.<WH7782>
Sing praise<WH2167> to God,<WH430> sing praises.<WH2167> Sing praises<WH2167> to our King,<WH4428> sing praises.<WH2167>
For God<WH430> is the King<WH4428> of all the earth.<WH776> Sing praises<WH2167> with understanding.<WH7919>
God<WH430> reigns<WH4427> over the nations.<WH1471> God<WH430> sits<WH3427> on his holy<WH6944> throne.<WH3678>

The princes<WH5081> of the peoples<WH5971> are gathered together,<WH622> the people<WH5971> of the God<WH430> of Abraham.<WH85> For the shields<WH4043> of the earth<WH776> belong to God.<WH430> He is greatly<WH3966> exalted!<WH5927>
